tests.name: Quiz - QUESTIONS.txt
tests.description: Check if the answers in QUESTIONS.txt are correct. This file must be edited so that the correct ( ) choices are replaced with (X) and no other changes are made to the file.

tests.name: List - Print and Exit
tests.description: Print the empty list and exit

tests.name: List - Insert 3 and Print
tests.description: Add several items, check list size and print them back

tests.name: List - Get Command
tests.description: Checks that the ~get N~ command works correct to return value at Nth index of the list.

tests.name: List - Contains Items
tests.description: Add several items then print them back
